title: Wedding Invitation Font
content:
I've been looking for this beautiful font for a very long time...

Upload feature isn't working so here's a link:  
 [http://postimg.org/image/fykj36ryd/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824110809/http:/postimg.org/image/fykj36ryd/ "http://postimg.org/image/fykj36ryd/")

author: joejohnson9182

comments.content: Looking for the font used in headings but if anyone knows the sans serif please ID as well.
